mapper.insert: insert into picture_collection (id, picture_id, user_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pictureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, picture_id, user_id, create_time, update_time from picture_collection
